Classes in com.google.code.rees.scope used by com.google.code.rees.scope
MonitoredContext
          A serializable map that can be monitored for activity and destroyed when no longer active.
ScopeAdapterFactory
          A factory used by the ScopeManager for creating adapters for processing scopes.
ScopeManager
          Uses a ConversationManager and SessionManager to provide external frameworks with central manager for processing both the conversation and session scopes.

          Provides a Set of action classes for initializing configurations.
ScopeAdapterFactory
          A factory used by the ScopeManager for creating adapters for processing scopes.
ScopeManager
          Uses a ConversationManager and SessionManager to provide external frameworks with central manager for processing both the conversation and session scopes.
